description: Glide.js is a dependency-free JavaScript ES6 slider and carousel. It’s lightweight, flexible and fast. Designed to slide. No less, no more

name: @glidejs/glide

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: npm run sass:core && npm run sass:theme
scripts.build:js: npm run build:esm && npm run build:umd
scripts.sass:core: node-sass src/assets/sass/glide.core.scss dist/css/glide.core.css && node-sass src/assets/sass/glide.core.scss dist/css/glide.core.min.css --output-style=compressed
scripts.sass:theme: node-sass src/assets/sass/glide.theme.scss dist/css/glide.theme.css && node-sass src/assets/sass/glide.theme.scss dist/css/glide.theme.min.css --output-style=compressed
